name: CanonDodge
description:
Evade barrages of cannonballs thrown by your opponent while trying to collect keys. Then try to hit your enemy while he tries the same. Whoever collects the most keys wins the game! 

By:

Andréanne Bédard3D/2D ArtistNathan Sioui3D/2D Artist / Rigger & AnimatorDave DesautelsGame Designer / ProgrammeurPierre-Alexis Bouquin3D/2D ArtistValérie Grenon-FréchetGame DesignerLouis-Philippe Lafontaine-BédardProgrammeur
